about.title: About me
about.string1: I am a developer from Colombia who is interested in web technologies, especially backend development. I was graduated of Academlo Bootcamp as a Full Stack Developer and the University (UTP) in the MisionTic 2022 government program.
about.string2: I develop my skills as an autodidact in online platforms as Udemy, Official Documentation and Stack OverFlow (Youtube and ChatGPT too but Shh! ðŸ¤«). I participated in the No Country program developing the backend of the Fashion Hunter app and I worked for eight months for the company BRM as a full stack developer.
